Name Test

Synopsis This is the synopsis.
Types map[lub(T1, T2), T3]
Details Cat2 AAA BBB Bla Cat1
Description PPPPPPsfd XXXXXX YYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYYY ZZZZZZZZ RRRRRRR SSSSSSSS TTTTTTTTT

Text in Figure: 
render(text("DEF"));
gives:

-----
ABC DEF
1 22222
The Figure xxx 
A = box(size(100), lineColor("black"), lineWidth(2), fillColor("green"));
B = ellipse(size(100), lineColor("black"), lineWidth(1), fillColor("yellow"));
render(hcat( [A, B, A], gap(10)));
will be displayed as
xx yy
zzz
